name: brad_lib
body:
### Welcome to brad_lib. 

This is my personal repo meant to store my helper scripts for radio astronomical data handling. As such, I can't guarantee that these scripts work for you! 

### Author
Bradley Frank (@foxmouldy)

### Support or Contact
Email me at frank.brad@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Python Scripts and Helper Functions for Radio Astronomical Data Handling
